price: Mola Mlezi wa mbingu na ardhi na viliomo baina yake, Mwenye nguvu, Mwenye kusamehe.
arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ
footnotes: Mola Mlezi wa mbingu na ardhi na viliomo baina yao, Mwenye nguvu asiye shindika, Mwenye kusamehe, akazifuta dhambi za mwenye kumuamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
